spec.name: Scout
spec.subtitle: Discovering New Planets
spec.description: There's finding a planet, and then there's going down to the planet and seeing what's what. The Scout is the professional for the task, trained to survey and survive, gathering all of the information he can while keeping his head attached to his body. While bravery in combat is one thing, there can be no denying the fearlessness of anyone willing ot touch down on a completely unknown planet and trudge about with only scanners and his wits to discover its secrets.
